entry.title: Sdet
entry.content: SDET is the most trending role when it comes to Automation Testers. If you look into Job Description of an SDET in any company they would ask for expertise in atleast two major programming languages. SDET is not less than a developer. You should know how to write optimised code, build frameworks, deploy code efficiently.
entry.summary: SDET is the most trending role when it comes to Automation Testers. If you look into Job Description of an SDET in any company they would ask for expertise in atleast two major programming languages. SDET is not less than a developer. You should know how to write optimised code, build frameworks, deploy code efficiently.

entry.title: Frameworks
entry.content: Frameworks are the core of any application. Test automation frameworks are almost equal with a web application framework.
entry.summary: Frameworks are the core of any application. Test automation frameworks are almost equal with a web application framework.

entry.title: Intro
entry.content:
This is one of my blogs which is aimed for beginners + Intermediate level Automation testers.

Here you can find out different test automation frameworks built from scratch, easy to understand, step by step procedures in readMe files, ready to deploy code. Java, Javascript, Python languages based code setup
entry.summary: This is one of my blogs which is aimed for beginners + Intermediate level Automation testers.
